Review: Internet not good..
Very clean, comfortable beds and very central location . Staff are friendly

The app was really useful. With regards their wifi, it’s strong but unfortunately it made of the apps I use not accessible since it doesnt detect the gps or location via their internet. In any case, nice stay. I just recommend giving complimentary breakfast to guests.
suggest to get family room to have larger space in the room it was also accessible going anywhere
Great experienced
Accessible, clean, near banks..good value for money.

My stay in the hotel was great. Room is okay. However, there is water being provided, no toot brush and toothpaste and no slipper. There is no 24/7 convenience store nearby where you can buy drinks. But related to hotel service and comfort is okay.

Kinuha namin Twin Room, Kaya ko first choice ang Red Planet kasi Affordable at gusto ko talaga malinis ang hotel. So, Na impressed naman ako kasi malinis kaso yung lalagyan nila ng shampoo at soap parang hindi ako sanay kasi iba sya from the hotel na nakasanayan ko. Sa kanila may lalagyan Na e press mo lang. Hindi ko alam kong anong tawag doon. Sa tingin ko yung lalagyan old na kaya hindi gaanong malinis tingnan. Sana baguhin nila. At yung floor ng CR Sana palitan na nila kasi medyo luma na sya. Regarding naman sa laki o liit ng Twin Room para sa akin Okay lang na ganuon sya ka cute kasi mura rin naman eh. Pero totally, For me perfect to stay sya kasi Napakalinis, Kind at Friendly din yung mga Staff, Guard, Housekeeper lahat sila napa ka friendly. Alam mo talagang gusto nila trabaho nila at mababait.
love the comfy bed. linens are great. the bath towels smells nice and looks new. had a very good night's sleep.
aircon automatically shuts down
Locations is near to the area of our concerns and near to the malls. Transportation accesibility. We got a great price deal during our hotel booking.
good to stay.. far from tourist spot but transportation are accessible because hotel is along the road.
No comment

Stayed for one night on the next day before my flight back to Manila. Clean place. Customer service was excellent! The A/C of the room where I was staying had an error and I was promptly moved to another room with a working A/C. Value for money and clean too!!!
Good customer service
The room is very clean. The staff are very nice to their guest.
Compared to other budget hotels the best in Davao
Good hotel when attending to events in SM or Ayala
Lack of amenities.

Staff was very accomodating to our request and courteous to guest. They even let us check in on an earlier time. Location is perfect as its beside the highway. Easy to grab taxi and right beside a supermarket.

This is my 3rd time to check into a Red Planet Hotel. Already been to the Cebu and Cagayan de Oro branches. Third time here in Davao. I have no complaints but the bathroom smelled like the sewer. It was on the 8th floor. Otherwise would still choose Red Planet again for future bookings.
very basic amenities. small room but very clean. If you only need a room to sleep in this hotel will suit you.
I love staying here!

Very good choice if all you are after is a clean and comfortable place to sleep in after a day outside. There is a restaurant on the ground floor that offers a decent choice of meals. Bed is nice and clean but there is no table so forget about working with your laptop unless you do this on the bed. I will come back if looking for another no frills stay.
I am satisfied with the service.
Location always near the city center,affordable and comportablle in every aspect

Staff do not endorse what we needed to acquire3 upon checkout. The night shift said he will endorse to the morning shift , such that the folio shall have been ready by 6AM, but apparently did not, hence it was only prepared upon check out which delayed the travel to the airport. The toilet-shower room area was not cleaned well, there were stains and hair in the shower room the next morning, when it should have been cleaned the day before. In fairness, the bed and linens were still so soft and smelling good.
Keep up the good work.
Hotel didn't disappoint us. The Aircon is very cold and the service is great.

I can't really fault the hotel. Those that do must have bad luck or be exceptionally fussy. Very clean,very comfortable, good modern air con out of the oppressive Davao heat. Excellent base for airport and in easy reach of two of the best malls in Davao (Abreeza & SM Lanang - in my humble opinion). For the money you can't beat it. Rooms are compact but that is never a consideration for us. Shower, modern and clean. Will stay again in future.

The room is of good size, i love their nice big bed, clean sheets and the room is well maintained. The only issue I had was the noise coming from the next door neighbors at past midnight. And since there was no in-room phone I had to go to the corridor for the phone to ask reception to call the other guests' attention. But since it was busy I had to pad down reception to report in person - a bit of a hassle.
It was just a place to stay for the night. Service was satisfactory. I have already forgotten if they had toiletries for use during our stay.
Bed space for couple is quite tight but just alright since we only needed an overnight just to catch a flight. Free breakfast is a plus.
the Red Planet was great place to stay , room was small , though I just slept and showered there , everyone was great the talked and even odd joke , id stay there again , next year for sure
you have to pay for bathroom essentials and hotel slippers. also no water and did not honor my free breakfast

we stayed here for 3nights. the room, linens, pillows are very clean and dainty. because we have a 2 year old who normally make some mess especially in the toilet, spill water everywhere etc, we normally leave the place in chaos but when we come back at night, the place seem to reset in its clean state! the cable has channels to keep my kid entertained. the staff are accomodating. the location is near the mall, airport and its easy to get a ride. keep it up!
need to check the amenity like iron facility as the one issued didn’t work..
As always The Red Planet Davao offers excellent service , clean comfortable rooms. Located close to 3 Shopping Malls and 10 minutes from the International airport. Thanks I will be back again soon
Great staff. Very friendly and helpful. Nice room and hotel is in a great location. Showing signs of age on the outside but very comfortable inside. My first choice for Davao City

Tried to get us to pay for a breakfast even though it was clearly paid for and covered in the booking details.. Booking details Occupancy: 1 Adult, 1 Child Breakfast: Included Nickle and dime you to death.. Tom
toilet was not maintained well. sink was not working.
Great hotel for surfers as near Cloud 9, but if you want to be near the "center" stay in General Luna area. Room was big, great for big groups. Staff could have smiled more when being addressed.
Second time visit still of a VERY HIGH STANDARD and EXCELLENT VALUE with the BEST STAFF 😄
Hope to have complementary foods nor drinks! In general, great comfort indeed!

One thing to note is that they have fast Internet/WIFI. The room was clean but the showerhead has black molds. The staff were courteous. To add, one day my wife left her wallet in our room, but when we came back all the money is still in there. Overall, our stay was great.
They really have small rooms but nevertheless it was clean, neat and the staff are very accomodating..kudos!!
I booked this room for Family friend and he was so pleased to have a great night stay, good sleep. Always the room of choice for stop over in Davao.

This is the best hotel for business trips! The price is very reasonable, the rooms are spotless and new, and the staff is very pleasant to talk too. Will definitely use Red Planet for all my business trips!
This hotel is always our option when we want a cheap place to stay whilst in the city. Rooms may be small but we are always put most of the day anyway so doesn’t really matter.
The staff was very accommodating and attended to our concerns immediately as well as the security guards.
clean and comfortable
clean, great value of money and very accessible for everything...
In any hotel, the staffs can add value to yout stay. Everyone here is polite and courteous. I had a wonderful stay in this business man’s hotel.
Fruits should be allowed except for strong smelling food. They should put cups for drinking.
Staffs are very friendly. Location is perfect. Close to shopping center. Value for money!
Had been returning to this hotel many times. Everything was as expected.

Pros: value for money and location is okay. Cons: its very hard to talk to a giy receptionist when i ask him about my late check out with a fee of P500 (since this is the cost and policy amount) he said that he canot accomodate my late check out last april 9 due to he did not know the mass arrival. (And he didnt even care to check with the computer) he can only accomodate me if i book anothe night. Hehe Anyways, spoke with the pregnant receptionist when hes not around and she gladly accept my request promptly. Shout our to the preggy. Thank you. Over all it was okay and had fun in davao for our overnight stay
Best value of this hotel is their staff...... great service and details.
hotel with great staff. location is central and have easy access to transportation.

Having never stayed in the Philippines before only have UK standards to compare with. When the Internet did not work in my room I was immediately we located and was impressed with the service. Television broke once again it was sorted within minutes. Shame there is no coffee making facilities in the room and a little cramped but only needed bed and breakfast facilities not home comforts.
The place is a walking distance from Robinson’s mall and the staffs were very accomodating.

200Php from Ecoland Terminal to Red Planet 150Php from Red Planet to Davao Airport Walking distance to SM Lanang, Robinsons, Carmelite Church Near tourist spots also Will definitely come back if the price is the same or lower I hope they will have promotions and Davao Day Tour Package
I really love this hotel, near airport, clean and really accessible to all the tourist spots. Stayed here twice and will stay again in our future travel to Davao. :)
High Quality bed linens, strong shower. Limited parking so u will park outiside on tandem. They don’t provide free bottled water
Clean, comfy, accessible. A business traveler's hotel.
Comfortable linens, nice shower but no free bottled water.
Competive priced with clean smaller room and clean showers. Very modern and updated . Did not see a swimming pool
Wish they have more tissues n toiletries

My girlfiend’s gold bracelet were stolen when she left it on the side table because the safe were not working. When we reported the incident to the front desk we were informed that they will investigate and inform us while we are on our sight seeing trip of the outcome. That day, we received a text message that the person who entered our room who left fresh towels said that they didn’t noticed the bracelet when they entered our room. When we came back that night we informed the front desk that the result of the their investigation was unsatisfactory and that we will report the incident to the police for proper disposition and investigation. That following day while packing home she found the bracelet inside one of our drawstring bag who we found very strange since those bags were only used for footwear and that it won’t end up there even accidentally. We suspect that we staff returned it inside the bag when we said that we will reprt the matter to the police.
Rooms are clean and tidy. Very small and minimalist, but it got all the confort needed for a few days stay.
We like the bed
The hotel is clean and comfortable. Value for money.
its a good hotel, very clean and staff are friendly. Location is nice, near abreeza and sm lanang. about 25 mins ride to the airport. Only thing is they don't allow ironing, even flat hair iron.
good value for money nice place to rest
Nice & clean rooms..

Red Planet-Dvo has become our mainstay hotel everytime we are taking a flight to another place as location is most appropriate. Cleanliness is of utmost importance to us as well. Hotel Staff are accommodating and professional in their dealings with clients.
Over priced for what you get.
would stay here again
nice place to stay..

The hotel lobby is located at the second floor of the building. Though I checked in late, the check in process was quick and the front desk staff was nice. The wifi was also working well. I liked the hot shower and the water pressure. Overall an okay hotel but for the price, there may be cheaper options in Davao.
good!

Clean room... but bathroom door cannot close properly. I would like to extend for 9 more days but the front desk agent that I spoke to didn’t work well with our rate... inspite we are long staying guest! Seems like no considerations and no options given to meet the rate... kinda disappointed.. coz we like to stay.
Value for money, good location and they provide nice breakfast!

The place was great. Unlike other hotels, it's simple but you will have all your basic needs . Hot and cold shower with a good water pressure, strong wifi signal, towels, hangers, hair blower, and great linens. We did return to a clean room after a day from the convention, with new towels amd linens. Looking foward to stay in one of your hotels someday. Thank you

The other elevator didn't work for 6 days I was there so I was worried that, with all the events happening in Davao, it could malfunction for overusage. So could potentially be left with no working elevators and I pity the people who had rooms above the 2nd floor lobby.
It was very clean. Really a budget hotel. Plain room and shower. There was a tv. No ref. No Closet. If you are looking just for a room to stayin. This is it.
the bed is too bouncy and at least there's should be complimentary mineral water.
All the room amenities were good, like the shower and bed. Clean room overall except for bed sheets looked a little old and dirty, some stains
if you are here only to rest / sleep, then this is a very practical hotel.

Best sleep I've had in a hotel! Perfect in simplicity, functionality, and practicality :) if there's one thing I'd change or suggest, it is to provide bedroom slippers or bathroom slippers. Will definitely go back!

Good place to for just resting after a day's out. Best to bring your own toiletries as they sell toothbrush & toothpaste instead of providing and the shampoo is 2in1 with soap. Otherwise, good enough room for short haul.
Had to stay last minute due to missed flight. Great room for a night or city stay. Booked via Agoda app for 1200 Pesos. Price at FO was 1900 pesos.
Security staff were friendly, helpful & kind! They should have been in front desk for staff there were exact opposite!
staff are polite and attentive
Comfortable stay, clean, comfy bed, perfect toilets, great location

I have stayed in Red Planet Hotel in Manila, which is why i chose this hotel in Davao. The staff is very accomodating and nice. The rooms are clean and the space is just nice for 2-person who are just looking for a place to sleep in. The location is great also, you can just go out and hail a taxi or ride a jeep.
Room is very CLEAN. No restaurant and house Phone. Breakfast is always crowded in a Small Cafe at the ground floor.
Better if they will provide slippers, toothpaste.

Bathroom tiles needed some repairs in our room. One tile in the shower area was loose. Water was seeping inside and gave off a foul smell. Soap dispensers needed repairs as well as the covers fall off when you push it.
Clean and ample room for an overnight stay. Staff is always great and accommodating.

I stayed in cebu and cagayan red planet hotel i did not notice if they have a toothbush kit or not. But in davao they dont have any. if you stay here make sure you bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste because they dont have any.
Lobby smells good, room is clean, although it is a little small. Super comfy bed. Basic no frill hotel, great for a short stay.
Good Place
The location of the Hotel is good, walking distance to Malls. The room is clean and has comfortable bed with international comforter bedsheet that i am used too. Will surely booked here again.

the hotel is nice and it is very well located and close to the malls and establishments of the airport, very clean and the bed is super soft and comfortable sleep you can really relax from a trip, and their security is really safe and they always check things before checking in and entering the hotel, keep it up Red Planet Davao for your good service.
I shall return
Clean, affordable hotel. Friendly front staff, need to be more informative tough. Rooms are basic but comfortable. Location not that great. Would definitely book Red Planet Hotel for my next visit.

the hotel is nice and it is very well located and close to the malls and establishments of the airport, very clean and the bed is super soft and comfortable sleep you can really relax from a trip, and their security is really safe and they always check things before checking in and entering the hotel, keep it up Red Planet Davao for your good service.
A lady staff was very helpful to me I forgot to get her name as I was so tired morning of January 9th between 8:30-9:30am.
Strategic located near malls and airport
Drainage in my room was not okay
Hotel is new, clean and bed is so comfortable. Good security and over all good value for money. Will come back next time we are in Davao City.
Very clean rooms & comfy pillows
Situated in the main road where Taxis and Multicabs are conveniently located
Just near SM Lanang and a ride away to Abreeza Mall and other tourist spots.
Nice hotel but no fridge. You can't bring food in your room. Misleading information it says that free breakfast but when I printed out the voucher it shows that breakfast is not included.

The location was perfect, situated at the main road. There is a cafe downstairs and the supermarket is just a 3 minute walk. SM Lanang is only a 5 minute cab ride away. You get value for money with their facilities. The staff were very accommodating and helpful.

We had a great stay. The staff was friendly. Just a bit disappointed with the cleanliness of the toilet (was not cleaned well) and the towels (one had stains and one had a hole in it). The soap dispenser did not contain soap since we checked in and was never refilled.
Very affordable
Of course the shower, its amazing.. thr cleanliness of the room and most especially the linens. The staff was very helpful especially when you need something.
Great location and Like the cleanliness
Excellent place to stay and not that pricy.
Seems like the staff have not been well trained.

Would have been the usual great experience but this time they forgot to put BATH TOWELS. So after showering, with no telephone in the room, had to install the damn app just to contact the front desk to give the towerl -_-
Super clean hotel. Small room but beds are comfy. Massage parlors are just few steps away from the hotel. Coffee shop is just next to the hotel.
Good

First time to be able to stay here for induction and it's a great place to stay for those short or long term stay. Rooms are clean, front desk is approachable. It may not have so many amenities but it's enough. The breakfast place downstairs is great as well. It may be priced for tourists but I was satisfied with my American breakfast.
I had a great stay. Will come back again

. I booked a room for my niece birthday for 2 nights and requested if they can do something for her. The staff at Red Planet made it so special. My niece was surprised! She loves the birthday balloons and a birthday cake. Thank you so much for making her birthday memorable. We stayed there 2 years ago and my niece requested this hotel again. The rooms were clean, location is great, there’s a massage place next door which i loved. Will definetely come back.

Always our first option when we travel back to Davao City. Great location- just along the highway, with parking space but a 1st come basis. Big plus- its comfortable bed! (Unlimited “ligid ligid”) 🤣 and its rain like shower! Only missing- No convenience store below, as compared to other Red planet branches. Staffs were accommodating, especially the sec. guards downstairs at the parking area 👍
The place is very clean and also just a nearby to shopping malls which makes it very convenient.
No coffee making facilities, no fridge, very bad mattress, very small rooms, very basic clean and cheap
no phone in room.

The picture is different from the actual room. Akala mo malaki ang kwarto, pero no! Very disappointing. We cant get our money back so we just stayed there for the whole duration of staying in Davao. Ang staffs nila, they're like nice but they're not. They smile in your face but then seems like don't even want to serve you or give the service that you deserve to have. But ofcourse money talks. Kapag foreigner, they're nicer. Kapag mukhang wala ka lang or poor , wala lang. Ni greetings or smile wala. Lalo na jan sa restaurant nila, parang ayaw magserve eh. Parang matatakot ka tawagin sila or yung mga waitress kasi mukhang naiinis sila , ayaw nila magtrabaho. Very disappointing talaga.
Value for Money Hotel Clean and cozy atmosphere. Great Staff Good location

The location is good for the market, but for the clients it is so crowded. For the facilities and cleanliness with the average grade is 4 out of 10, the property is affordable for foreign guest unlike for those domestic guest. And for the staff many of them are lack of energy and heart on work.
I like Red planet hotels. I look for them wherever I travel in Asia. I can count on my stay being comfortable safe and pleasant.
Value for money is a pro, con parking is limited at times.

The staff was wonderful they cater to our every needs the room was a little small for me I am handicapped but they have a handicap room and I should have booked it for the money it was a great value especially serving breakfast every morning I needed a refrigerator for my insulin and they didn't have in room but they have at the front desk and anytime I needed to get they were available all in all it was a great value for the money and the staff was wonderful
Cleanliness, Location . . . 2 very important things in my hotel . . .
Easy to book, excellent service, very nice and helpful hotel staffs 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻
Checking out is exceptionally fast.
mejo mahigpit lang pagka nag smoke ka sa room nila, nag ccharge talaga sila :) kahit may lysol pa :)

Value for money! The room is clean and staff are very accommodating especially the guards who are very informative on where to go and even gave fliers on who to contact whenever you wanted to avail tours.
the plqce is near the robinson and sm lanang.. friendly staff and SG..
I really appreciate the immediate response of the staff when I’m in need of something. The internet connection is a bit poor. Towels have brown stains.
not good
good place to stay. only problem during my stay was that im hearing faint noises like sound of a drill.
great price and location. service of staff is 5star. lots of places of interest near-by
Pro-cost, location, beds, sume but all you need. Con-car park limited so do it before 6pm or it fills up. No ref in room ......all in all its worth it to me.
Friendly and accommodating staff, clean and value for money. Always in a good location, accessible to restos and malls.
works for those who will be out most of the time. I love that there is also a ceiling fan aside from an air conditioner because this helped me dry my washed clothes overnight.

The most unbelievable learning I got from staying in Red Planet Davao is that it is a zero-star establishment, just because it lacks the basic amenities like fridge (which I do not mind). However, it can easily knockout other 3- or 4- or 5-star hotels with its cleanliness, coziness and presentation of itself. Linens are superb, super comfy, and super-clean. Truly, worth coming back to. Location is not that great, but you can take a ride to the nearest mall. Staff are super-nice and super-okay. They are accommodating and ever-smiling!
no slippers, no hot water in room and staffs are smiling but not friendly
Nice stay; though the room was small, limited space; amenities are limited like shampoo and soap are dispensed in one dispenser.
Great and friendly staff! Very clean room! I’ll definitely book my hotel here again if I visit Davao again
Water dispenser should be on common area. Had to go down to 2nd from 8th floor for a hot water.
Left my wallet in my room after having checked out. Called them and they found it! Got my wallet back in no time!
Pro cost, con limited parking and noise bouncing off time floors
Pros - cheap. adequate room for the price. Cons - no potable water, no room service.
SM Mall is just 5mins walk away.

I use this hotel because the cleanliness is acceptable, it is ok for a 5:00 am flight, close to a couple of malls, has dependable WiFi and the price is ok. Room is small. Tv is small. Zero amenities. It is basically a clean room with a tv and shower and that is it.
Im only unhappy that no have any ventilation in the room . The window is always locked even cant opened a small gap
Its no food if no any ventitalion. The window be full locked even a little. Just small ventilation toilet. Thats worst.
Clean rooms. Near Robinson's and SM. Small room but comfortable bed and very good AC system. Good breakfast at the restaurant.
I love Red Planet. My go-to hotel whenever I visit Davao. Very clean, simple and value for money.

This I a very bare bones kind of hotel. But what they lacked in space and facilities, they made up with super clean rooms PLUS very attentive and excellent staff! :) Thank you for accommodating my request even if it was last minute.
Nice hotel

When in Davao, this is one of our go-to hotel especially when we hit the airport at dawn the next day! This hotel chain always exceeds our expectation. As a matter of fact in Manila, we also use Red Planet hotels. ♥️
The only thing lacking is Wardrobe Cabinet. & if you travel wt big luggage there's no space in the room. the room is too small. Light in the bed sides are too shiny .
Good Value Hotel with 5star Customer Service Good location with many places of interest near-by

The hotel really offers value for money for a quick overnight stay. The room is equipped with everything you'll need - TV, Air Conditioning, Bathroom with soap and shampoo, hangers, and a clean and comfy bed. Location is okay - around a 12 - 15 minute walk to SM Lanang and around 10 mins away by car to Abreeza Mall. There's a 7-11 convenience store around a 3 minute walk away. No problem to find a taxi too as the hotel is located along a main road.
Very nice Staff
Just a short walk to SM Lanang, where I attended an Expo. Also, very accessible to public transport.
Room is too small and no space for guests luggages
Hotel Staff was great. Service is top notch. Clean and Budget Friendly Hotel with many place of interest around (Restaurants, supermarkets, etc)
We will definitely stay in this hotel again.
good service
Thumbs up 👍
Clean and Comfortable Hotel No frills and Value for Money. Great Staff

Hotel's Location is great...close to my areas of interests (biz meetings, quick errands to malls) However age is already starting to show on the hotel's equipment / facility. Was first assigned to a room with the aircon automatically shutting down after a few minutes & the bidet was broken, called it to the frontdesk...they sent a maintenance technician but the issues were not resolved. when i called back that the issue recurred was offered to transfer to another room. the nxt room had a working aircon & bidet but the bed's spring is already starting to surface to the top of the bed. lost wifi connection even before the check out time...tried contacting the frontdesk via their app (by this time I already shifted to my mobile data), but it wasn't connecting to their server (there is no phone inside the room, connection to the frontdesk / customer service is via their app)
Fantastic place!! staff are amazing!.. Location is great! easy to get transport only thing it needs is a 7-11 close by like all the other red planets. Thank you :)

We were checked in on the 2nd floor but was really noisy on our first night. We asked to be transferred on the succeeding nights to other room and it was good. Just be sure not to be in the 2nd floor as these is where their lobby is ( their ground floor serves as the parking area)
Clean, very convenient location.
great value for money...

I guess something went wrong, so I have to write it again. I've had problems in room 817, which was near the stairs and noisy water heater could be heard 24/7. Also the wifi was extremely slow there. Only on the last day when they moved me to the 2nd floor I had a very good wifi and no noise. The staff are great in all Red planet hotels, they even helped me to break open my suitcase when the lock got stuck.
This is a very good business hotel. Everything was just perfect during my stay.
Location is good, value for money, good staff, security and everything I need in a hotel room.
Convenient downtown location, cleanliness, staff and security is excellent. Always stay here when in Davao and will continue to do so.
Nice and clean
clean and very good staff
The hotel is excellent and clean but the staff they need a lot of training about custmor services for the price u pay..
Good experience 2 years ago that's the reason I came back w family.
Great Staff! Restaurants and Malls near by easy to get public transportation.
I always book this hotel whenever I travel to Davao City. The service ang location is great.

The restaurant downstairs served very economical meals. Suggestion to change the payment clause to cash payment upon arrival of guest in the hotel and not to charge automatically on the actual booking day without consent of guest. ..otherwise it was a restful stay.

The location is really good, it is in the middle of Sta Ana and Sasa wharf. It is also near to SM Lanang, just 5-8mins jeepney ride. The room is quite small but tidy. We really enjoyed our stay here :)
Red planet is a go to. Location-wise and price wise.

It's getting more than what you paid for. You get a very comfy bed, aircon is working, there's a fan, hair blower for the girls, shower pressure is strong, hot shower is working. Very good location, right beside it is a massage center that's cheap and a coffee shop. Further ahead are restaurants. so accessible
We are very satisfied with Red Planet Hotel...

I was totally expected that everything goes ok.But Unexpectedly ,was so bad in my room inside .How could you be in the room without free complementary water which I book online a standard room.They should provide a water for there guest .People have a good reviews there online but I don't think so if you can have a good comment below if you could stay there.I have no reason to go back In Red Planet in Cagayan .Also I book online in Red Planet in Davao .I had not once bad experience but twice .In Davao Red planet ,is still same.No water no Telephone they're just hanging in the hall-way and also the Shampoo ,conditioner and shower they mix it up in one .Ive never meet that kind of stuff before ,Isn't wierd right!. I couldn't imagine they have a good ratings but when I go there was not so right of what I expect for .Forgive me but I just express my feelings as a normal guest who check in there and I am not so happy during my stay .Bed is ok but the area in the room is too small .

Not for a staycation, but good enough for a traveler passing thru. No usual hotel amenities (wardrobe, minibar, toiletries, pool, gym), just the basics. so if you're just needing somewhere to spend the night, this is okay, just don't expect much. The lobby is also on the second floor so it's a bit inconvenient. An app has to be downloaded to get front desk assistance (no landline in the room), so if the guest is not "techie" or does not have an android phone, they have to go down to the front desk to get assistance. But it's new, it's clean, and the staff are nice.
Do not have telephone in the room for room service Do not have compliments in the room like mineral water Do not replace tooth brush and paste Do not have soap Do not have coffee or tea in the room

I have stayed at Red Planet hotels in a few different locations and they have always been modern and clean. They also have the best showers of any other hotel I've stayed at. The room is small but I have no hesitation in recommending the Red Planet to anyone.
Value for money, though a bit cramped, but for the price it's okay and comfortable.

Place is cozy and clean and that is what I like especially the bathroom since I am particular with it. Location is at its best near to robinsons mall so if you have basic needs it is just beside the hotel itself. Staff is excellent and always greet you with a smile. Checking in is a breeze.. Will be back definitely.
Super nice cute staff, Friendly, professional, Great location to everything, and affordable. Thank You :)
Best place throughout the Philippines.. Clean nice rooms, the staff are the best! always good location easy to access everything! will always stay here
Excellent Stay as always. Staff is attentive and gives excellent Service. Room Clean and tidy. Hotel is very near food establishment and Malls.

There is no such thing as a soap/shampoo/conditioner. Since I am limited to what I can take with me when I fly.... this matters. The staff is still pretty good. The internet is still pretty good. This is a no "frill" hotel as far as you room amenity is concerned. However, you'll be more than please with what they have in the room. The room is quite new (the whole building for that matter), very strong hot/cold shower. The room is tidy. It has air con and a ceiling fan- it really gets cold that we have to turn off the air con; the ceiling suffice. Don't expect a desk/table or even a single chair, no phone and that's pretty standard with the several red planet we stayed in. When it comes to front desk staff, the security, and all other workers there - I score them with high compliments. Public transportation is right there, and taxi is readily available. Next door is a Thai massage. Their rate is very competitive. Over all, I am a very happy camper. I highly recommend this hotel.

My first stay at a Red Planet hotel, the Davao branch had an excellent location, along J.P Laurel Ave which houses many of the major shopping complexes. Public transportation was available kerbside (taxis or PUV). The public areas of the hotel were clean and well maintained. The rooms themselves were compact but also kept neat and tidy. My room had twin beds, flatscreen tv, a safe and an area where clothes could be hung. A small fold out table was also available where you could house a netbook/laptop. The bathroom had good lighting and a good strong hot water system. The wifi connection was of a high standard with no interuptions. The one downside was that the AC control was built into the main electrical panel located at the entrance. A remote control would of been more handy for mobility. Overall I think this is a fantastic budget hotel and I would stay there again in future travels.

We asked the girl in front desk to check our safe as it was left the door open but the code for locked is on so we cannot use it. So she told us she will send someone, and we keep waiting for 2 hours no one came. So we message them through their app. And then she apologize telling the person in charge for maintenance is not around. She could have tell us that after few minutes not after hours!!. Then she rush to fix it. How hard it can be if she can also do it at the end after telling her we miss our dinner as we keep waiting.

Check in and check out was a breeze. It would take longer for a person to cross the hall to the seats and walk back to the counter than it would to check in or check out. The bed is comfy but the room is pretty cramp and has no closet to stash away your things. No coffee or tea facilities or toothbrush kit. Shampoo, conditioner and body wash are 3-in-1, so better bring your own. There's a hair dryer beside the floor length mirror. No telephone inside the room but there's one mounted by the elevator. There's a mobile phone app that you can download for easy access to the front desk. Your booking should appear in the app once you have registered. I don't know why mine didn't though. Cable TV channels are limited, many of which are religious. Free extra pillows may be requested. Shower pressure is fantastic. Only that water tends to spread to the lavatory area because there's no door on the shower cubicle. Our room was on the 4th floor facing the main road. But for the occasional ambulance sirens, there was no traffic noise. Staff are friendly, very efficient and helpful. The doorman and security guard will get you a taxi in no time. Café is situated outside the hotel entrance. Breakfast consists of the usual set menu - Filipino, American or Continental. If your room does not come with free breakfast, you may order other food. The prices are reasonable and the food is quite good. There's a pizzeria nearby for light fare. Next to the hotel building is a massage and spa center convenient to the weary traveler. The hotel is situated in the Lanang area, a little out of the way from the poblacion district. Taxi from the airport to the hotel was Php350 by arrangement, more than double the meter rate. From the hotel to the airport, meter rate was less than Php120. Most taxi drivers give exact change so if you wish to give some tip but not much, just say the amount of change they should return if you're giving a bigger bill that the meter fare. Our five-night stay in this hotel was the best I've ever had of any hotel in Davao. The staff was very accommodating and helpful, and the housekeeping staff was prompt in fixing up our room while we were away for the day. The washroom was incredibly clean and the hotel had excellent water pressure. Although the rooms are quite small, this is compensated by the excellent airconditioning and the humongous mirror which spans half the length of the room (above the headboard). The free breakfast (Filipino cuisine) provided actually seemed like a full-fledged lunch for most people as the servings are incredibly generous. The only problem I have is that the room does not contain the expected list of the TV channels which is often available in other comparable hotels. You have to channel surf through dozens of channels before finding the one you desire.

As already seen in other Red Planet hotels in Philippines, the Red Planet in Davao offers the same standards: small but clean rooms, very comfortable bed, efficient and quiet aircon, free wifi on the rooms, safety box, cable TV, excellent shower, secure accomodation... Hotel staff was very friendly. The location of the hotel is not totally perfect, if you don't have a car. But at least a Robinson's supermarket is just around the corner, 3 minutes walk. But taking a ride with taxi or jeepney anywhere is quite easy, since many of them are passing by the hotel on J.P. Laurel Ave, which is one of the main roads in Davao city. Taking a ride to Abreeza Mall or to SM Lanang takes about 5 minutes by taxi, getting to the airport takes approx. 20 minutes.
